channel.title: Post/2009/julies on Journal
channel.description: Recent content in Post/2009/julies on Journal

item.title: Where It At?
item.description:
I ordered my EeeBox yesterday! Comes with a 22” display as well. Hopefully the LCD is better than the hopelessly awful similarly sized displays I have here at work. It is a different model though—we’ll see…

However, websites and courier companies need better parcel tracking. Website I ordered it from says all items have been supplied. Which simply means courier has picked it up or something. And the courier website has no information on my tracking number.

I want my EeeBox already! And this whole claim of 1 business day delivery is so rubbish. If that were true, I should have it now! Not tomorrow, or the next day, or next week. I’m so impatient.

item.title: Ugh, Promotion
item.description:
Soooooo… turns out Skype had a promotion on at the time I registered and tested calling my phone. Nice of the signup process to not tell me! Well, explains why it doesn’t work anymore.

On a brighter note, Taras fixed my iNum problem! There a teeny lil setting on my Nokia phone that is set to on by default. It blocks anonymous callers for Internet calling. And since Google Talk identifies as an anonymous caller, my lil phone replies with “488 Not Acceptable Here.” So useful… :P

So yay! My iNum works! I should probably get a real data plan for my phone next.
